title: This Is the Old Testament Week 6 with Trillia Newbell
description:
For the sixth week of This Is the Old Testament, Raechel and Amanda welcome author and editor Trillia Newbell back to the podcast to discuss the Prophetic Books of Amos through Nahum. Whether you have apprehension or affection for the Minor Prophets, these three friends remind us that the prophetic genre testifies to God’s character, displaying His pursuit of His people by speaking through each prophet. From one prophetic book to the next, they consistently point out the comforting truth that God’s multifaceted character is not limited by our finite understanding. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 6 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Old Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com.
